alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 3:08PM CDT until April 01 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Light snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and winds gusting as high as 45 mph creating areas of blowing snow. Gusts to 55 mph are expected along the Lake Superior shorelines. * WHERE...Southern Lake, Carlton and South St. Louis and Pine Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band and the Mille Lacs Band, Lena Lake and, Hinckley areas. * WHEN...Until 4 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Pine; Southern Lake, North Shore
